channel.title: CVE Feed for Popup Box Team -- Popup box
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Popup Box Team -- Popup box

item.title: CVE-2024-34367|2024-08-02T02:51:11.170Z -- popup%20box%20team -- popup%20box
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Popup Box Team Popup box allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Popup box: from n/a through 4.1.2.
